title: Imagine
snippet: Visualizing potential futures for urban spaces
description: Imagination in urban planning allows for envisioning vibrant futures and novel solutions to current challenges. By imagining alternative realities, planners can develop visionary plans that cater to community well-being and environmental resilience.
literature: Urban Utopias by Howard, Wright, Le Corbusier
Design for Ecological Democracy by Randolph T. Hester
